netsurfers.gicp.net.common
类 BitmapMgr

java.lang.Object
  netsurfers.gicp.net.common.BitmapMgr

public class BitmapMgr
extends java.lang.Object

This class manager all the bitmap source.

作者：
Ziliang Wang E-mail: Lional.King@gmail.com
